amendment.description: To require reports on U.S. operations in Iraq.

action.text: Motion to table amendment SA 1271 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 50 - 45. Record Vote Number: 281.
Amendment SA 1271 proposed by Senator Boxer. (consideration: CR S9459-9463; text: CR S9459) To require reports on U.S. operations in Iraq.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to table amendment SA 1271 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 50 - 45. Record Vote Number: 281.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1271 proposed by Senator Boxer.
